metadata.name: Tower of Tears
metadata.description:
Often times as a photographer, the realities of a destination depart wildly from your expectations. On this trip to San Diego, I was not met by sunny skies and warm beaches, but cold and consistent rainy nights.

Yet this only ignited an excitement within me to capture such a rare scene, so I ventured out into Balboa Park to find the California Tower, water streaming down its face.
